meanings: (길·구멍 등을) block (up), obstruct, close, head off; (구멍 등을) stop (up), fill (in)
(일·행동 등을) stop, prevent, keep, head off; (금지하다) forbid

vlive.korean: [막았다!] [He blocked it!] View video ATEEZ : ATEEZ(에이티즈) WANTED 6화
[홉이가 주사위 던질 예정] - 내가 그래도 막았다 - 제가 던져볼까요? [j-hope will throw the dice] - I stopped it. - Shall I throw it? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.93
vlive.english: [j-hope will throw the dice] - I stopped it. - Shall I throw it?

vlive.korean: 내가 누구 막았다, 미안해요. I blocked someone. Sorry. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST W] 뉴블이 사는 세상(뉴.사.세) - JR 게임편
조심 조심 - 이걸로 막는 거야? Be careful. - Should I block it with this? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : "네 손님" 어서오십시오 필릭스네 식당입니다!👨‍🍳
vlive.english: Be careful. - Should I block it with this?

vlive.korean: 막아 - 조심 조심 - 맞아 맞아 - 아니면... Yes. - Be careful. - Right, right. - Or... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : "네 손님" 어서오십시오 필릭스네 식당입니다!👨‍🍳
vlive.english: Yes. - Be careful. - Right, right. - Or...

examples.korean: She gasped and her hand flew to her mouth. 발음듣기 그녀가 헉 하고 숨을 들이쉬더니 급히 손으로 입을 막았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She gasped and her hand flew to her mouth. 발음

examples.korean: He put his hands over his ears. 발음듣기 그가 두 손으로 귀를 막았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He put his hands over his ears. 발음

examples.korean: A tree broke his fall. 발음듣기 중간에 나무가 있어서 그의 추락을 막았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A tree broke his fall. 발음

examples.korean: He jammed his fingers in his ears. 발음듣기 그가 손가락으로 귀를 틀어 막았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He jammed his fingers in his ears. 발음

examples.korean: He parried a blow to his head. 발음듣기 그는 머리에 가해지는 타격을 막았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He parried a blow to his head. 발음
